list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: vibrations that travel through the air or another medium and can be heard when they reach a person's or animal's ear.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ánh sáng đi nhanh hơn âm thanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sound produced by continuous and regular vibrations, as opposed to noise.
music, speech, and sound effects when recorded, used to accompany a film or video production, or broadcast.
the ideas or impressions conveyed by words.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you've had a hard day, by the sound of it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn đã có một ngày vất vả, bởi âm thanh của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long surgical probe, typically with a curved, blunt end.
a narrow stretch of water forming an inlet or connecting two wider areas of water such as two seas or a sea and a lake.
emit or cause to emit sound.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một tiếng chuông lớn vang lên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: convey a specified impression when heard.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh nghe có vẻ lo lắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: ascertain (the depth of water), typically by means of a line or pole or using sound echoes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Mr. Pattison was sounding the depth of the water with a pole
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông Pattison nghe có vẻ sâu thẳm nước với một cây sào

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: question (someone), typically in a cautious or discreet way, as to their opinions or feelings on a subject.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we'll sound out our representatives first
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi sẽ phát ra những người đại diện của chúng tôi trước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially of a whale) dive down steeply to a great depth.
in good condition; not damaged, injured, or diseased.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ trở lại an toàn và âm thanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: based on reason, sense, or judgment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tư vấn âm thanh cho cuộc sống khỏe mạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a doze that deepened into a sound sleep
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một giấc ngủ đã sâu vào một giấc ngủ âm thanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: such people should be given a sound thrashing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những người như vậy nên được cung cấp một âm thanh đập
